icon-size.comment: Chevron-down icon size — matches the medium icon size

icon-gap.comment: Gap between chevron icon and select text

icon-inset-inline-end.comment: Distance from the inline-end border to the chevron icon (8px)

icon-color.comment: Chevron icon color — same as subtle button icon color

padding-inline-end-with-icon.comment: Right padding when icon is present: icon-size + gap + inset
